phrs.translation: 鬼斯通, 附身, 刚看了电影, 作祟者

sentences.sentence: With the shadow of my passion have I darken your eyes, Haunter of the depth of my gaze!
sentences.translation: 我用热情的浓影染黑了你的眼睛；我的凝视深处的崇魂！ ！
